# Marketing Options In Mangomint

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/marketing-options-in-mangomint/

## Category
01 Getting Started

## Subcategory

## Article Content

HOME
GETTING STARTED
SETTING UP YOUR ACCOUNT
Marketing Options in Mangomint

Mangomint includes built-in marketing features to help you create and send personalized emails and text messages to your clients.

This article covers the marketing options available in Mangomint, including Automated Flows and Campaigns.

Link copied
Automated Flows

The Flows app saves you time by automating your marketing messages.

Create personalized emails and text messages and automatically send them at the right time to the right clients.

Send rebooking reminders, exclusive promotions, review requests (e.g. Google reviews), and more.

Select a pre-built flow to help you get started. Easily customize pre-built flows to fit your business needs.

You can also book a 1:1 consultation call with our team if you need help creating flows or to discuss how you can use flows to drive more profit for your business.

Learn more about creating automated flows.

Link copied
Campaigns

The Campaigns app is an easy way to send one-time messages to your clients.

Create emails and send them to your entire client list or only to specific clients. You can filter recipient lists by appointment history, membership status, client tags, and more.

Send custom emails for special events, holiday promotions, monthly newsletters, and more.

Several email templates are available to help you get started.

Learn more about creating email campaigns.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
